T05nagsaliu:529: phalasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ puṣpeṇābhinirvartita iti |
T05nagsaliu:530: atha punarbīje sati aṅkurāditaḥ phalādi paryantaṃ prādurbhāvaḥ |
T05nagsaliu:533: pratyayastu pṛthivyādi kālāntaṃ hi yathā kramam |
T05nagsaliu:534: tasmādeva kathaṃ bāhyapratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavya ityādi uktam |
T05nagsaliu:535: bāhyapratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandhāḥ katidhā draṣṭavyā ityuktam ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt
T05nagsaliu:537: pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśartudhātūnāṃ yathākramaṃ samavāyād bāhyapratītyasamutpādasyeti pratyayatā yathākramam |
T05nagsaliu:539: eṣām hetupratyayānāṃ katamasya karma katamad iti cet? tasmād uktam |
T05nagsaliu:542: tatra pṛthivīdhāturbījasya saṃdhāraṇakṛtyaṃ karotīti bījamaṅkurotpādonmukhamāśrayatvāt kaṭhinatvameva ucyate |
T05nagsaliu:544: tejo dhātuḥ paripācayatīti paripuṣṭayavasare upapadyamāne paraspara-sparśeṇoṣṇatā eva paripāka
T05nagsaliu:546: vāyudhātur abhinirharatīti vardhanatvād, svāvasthāyāḥ samuddhṛtya bahirā
T05nagsaliu:550: ṛturapi bījasya pariṇāmanakṛtyaṃ karotīti ṛturapi sarvākāraṃ abhinirharati |
T05nagsaliu:555: no cet pratyayasāmagrī bīje bhūte 'pi nāṅkuraḥ |
T05nagsaliu:561: tatra pṛthivīdhātornaivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ saṃghātakṛtyaṃ karomīti |
T05nagsaliu:562: tadvat jale agnau, vāyau, ākāśe, ṛtau cāpi naivaṃ bhavati |
T05nagsaliu:565: bījahetukatadaṅkurādīnām utpādo na svato parato nāpi na dvayoḥ kartṛkālataḥ |
T05nagsaliu:570: atra na kaścidutpadyate na ca kaścin nirudhyate |
T05nagsaliu:578: tasmād vastūnāṃ svabhāvata utpādo na yujyate,
T05nagsaliu:580: yasyānusāraṃ bhāvāḥ satataṃ sthitāḥ tadanusāram utpāda-kriyā-karma-sthiti-vināśā api na
T05nagsaliu:582: tasmād atra doṣasya prasajyamānatvān na svata ityuktam |
T05nagsaliu:583: bhāvānām svata utpādaścet nityamutpādaprasaṃgaḥ syāt, ākāśavat |
T05nagsaliu:584: kasyacidapi kutrāpi kadāpi utpādo nirodho vā nāstīti cet- ucyate- pratyakṣavirodhaḥ |
T05nagsaliu:585: evaṃ bhāvānāṃ hetupratyayād utpādo bhāsate, tasmāt tāvad bhāvānāṃ na svabhāvata utpādaḥ
T05nagsaliu:598: ayaṃ hetuḥ śayanopamayā na yujyate saṃghātatvāt |
T05nagsaliu:600: katham ātmā asaṃghātaḥ san svaśarīrābhāve śayanādīn aṅgasaṃghān svarūpeṇopakartuṃ yujyate
T05nagsaliu:603: ātmanaḥ saṃghātatvād hetupratyayayorutpādopalabdha ātmātmīya iti manyanākārapravṛtteḥ cittamevātmā ityucyate |
T05nagsaliu:604: atrāntaḥ karaṇapuruṣaḥ kūrmakeśasvabhāvavad yuktyanumānarahitastu kvacinnāstīti darśayitum bhagavatā bāhyādhyātmikabhāvānāṃ parata utpādo na yujyata ityuktam |
T05nagsaliu:605: yadi bhāvānāṃ svato 'pi notpādo na ca parato 'pi, tadā bhāvānāṃ dvividha utpāda iti cet,
T05nagsaliu:607: na dvayoḥ na ca kālata ityuktam |
T05nagsaliu:609: anye tu svaparayoḥ sambandhād bhāvotpādaṃ manyante |
T05nagsaliu:616: tadā paratantreṇa kartrā utpādavināśau bhaviṣyata iti kaiściducyate |
T05nagsaliu:617: anye tīrthikāstu karttā nāma kaścid ādyaḥkartā, nityo 'navacchinno
T05nagsaliu:618: vyāpakaścātmeti kaścidasti, sa eva bāhyamābhyantarañcedaṃ sarvam utpādayati vināśayatīti manyante
T05nagsaliu:623: kartustu ākāśavan nirvikāratvāt tadadhīnā utpāda-sthitivināśāśca naiva yujyante |
T05nagsaliu:624: kasmāditi cet, karttari nirvikāra-niṣkriyākāśātmani kriyā karma ca
T05nagsaliu:628: yadanusāraṃ karttāramapekṣate pravṛttistadanusāraṃ bhāvānām utpāda-sthiti-vināśāśca sadā āsannā
T05nagsaliu:629: | karturnityatvād bhāvānām utpādao-sthiti-vināśā yugapad bhaviṣyanti athavā utpāda-sthiti-vināśā na bhaviṣyanti |
T05nagsaliu:630: nityatvāt kvacidapi kiñcidapi utpādo vā vināśo vā na syāt |
T05nagsaliu:631: hetuṃ pratyayañca apekṣya pravartamānānāṃ bhāvānāmeva kartṛ-kriyā-hetuphalotpādasamaḥ kramodbhava upalabhyate |
T05nagsaliu:633: avikārahetubhiḥ parasparamāśritya pravartamānaiḥ utpādaniyamo na yujyate |
T05nagsaliu:636: hetau phale ca saṃbhinne 'vikārastu kathaṃ bhavet |
T05nagsaliu:638: kriyānanvitavandhyāputrātmani kasyāścit kriyāyāḥ karmaṇo vā niyatena ayuktatvād bhagavaddharmeṣu avisaṃvāditvād bhāvotpādakriyā karttāraṃ nāpekṣate, kintu sati hetupratyayasaṅgrahe bhāvānāmutpādavināśau yujyeta ityuktam |
T05nagsaliu:648: yakṣa-rākṣasa-ḍākinyādayaḥ sarve paraghātakāḥ, sukha-duḥkhādayaḥ svargo vimokṣaśca tāni sarvāṇi cittotpādamātreṇoddhṛtānīti vadanti |
T05nagsaliu:650: gatānugatikāścaiva yuktiviśeṣarahite tasmin gauravapravaṇatvāt pūrvottaraviruddhaṃ bālayuvakacāṇḍālavadayathārtha
T05nagsaliu:652: bhakṣyābhakṣyaṃ, svargāpavargādiphalaviruddhaṃ, yuktyāgamādiviruddhaṃ ca vāṅmātreṇa pakṣīkṛtya nijājñānapaṭalena netrācchādanatvād asamarthatvāt paśubhūtāstu paśubhyo 'pyatichudratarāḥ paśavaḥ |
T05nagsaliu:654: utpāde sthitau ca sahetuka evābhyupagamyamāne sati nityavādabhaṅgatvād vādotsargaḥ, viparītasiddhatvād īśvarasya ahetutvameva sidhyati |
T05nagsaliu:655: icchāmātreṇa utpāde sati yugapadeva sampūrṇajagata utpādasthiti-vināśāḥ syuḥ |
T05nagsaliu:661: hetupratyayavaikalye kramotpādavināśau pratyakṣatayā bhāsete, avaikalye cānutpādaḥ |
T05nagsaliu:664: kasyacidapi bhāvasya utpāda-sthiti-vināśā na yujyante| tasmādapi pratyakṣavirodho 'siddhārtha
T05nagsaliu:670: ekāntakriyāyuktā yuktayorgāmbhīryaguṇasya rūpādervā ālambana cintanasyaiva ayuktatvāt, tattu pratikūlam |
T05nagsaliu:671: hetāvasati sarvatra pratyaya eva kathaṃ bhavet |
T05nagsaliu:673: bhāvakartā maheśaścet so 'pi kartā na manyate |
T05nagsaliu:674: pitrabhāve sutotpattiḥ sā neṣṭā dṛśyate na ca |
T05nagsaliu:678: tathā maheśvare nitye bhāvānāṃ syāt sadodbhavaḥ |
T05nagsaliu:683: tasmādīśvarakartṛtvābhyupagame bahudoṣasaṃbhavād bhagavatā bhāvānām utpādaḥ īśvarakṛto na yujyate ityuktam |
T05nagsaliu:684: pare tu sarvaṃ kālena vivartitaṃ manyante |
T05nagsaliu:689: atra kāla iti kiṃ nāma? nityo vā anityo vā, puruṣaḥ strī napuṃsakasvabhāvo vā, devo piśāco vā, mūrto 'mūrto vā, sakriyo niṣkriyo vā
T05nagsaliu:690: sa nityaścettadā tatra kriyāpekṣā na yujyate |
T05nagsaliu:701: anyacca, svabhāvavādina āntarabāhyān sarvabhāvān svabhāvodbhavān manyante |
T05nagsaliu:702: bhāvānāṃ svabhāva eva, kasyacidbhāvasya utpādasya vināśasya vā kaścidapi heturnāsti |
T05nagsaliu:706: sukṛtaṃ duṣkṛtaṃ cāpi sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ sadā sthitam |
T05nagsaliu:709: vikāro vartate yatra nirvikāraḥ kathaṃ bhavet |
T05nagsaliu:713: kule rājani kṣetrādau tatphalaṃ cāpi bhāsate |
T05nagsaliu:714: svabhāve vikṛte jāte nityavādī tu bhraṃsate |
T05nagsaliu:719: ahetuto bhavanti ityapare 'hetuvādino hetuṃ vinaiva kevalam
T05nagsaliu:721: ahetuvādo 'bhyapagamyeta cet, hetoḥ aniścitatvāt kṛtapraṇāśa-akṛtābhyāgama-anavasthāśca bhaviṣyanti
T05nagsaliu:724: tasmāttasyaiva doṣasya prasajyamānatvād ahetuvādo 'pi lokādi-viruddhatvād asiddha eva |
T05nagsaliu:727: na svataḥ parato nāpi na dvayoḥ kartṛkālataḥ |
T05nagsaliu:733: tasmādeva sūtre atha punaḥ pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśartudhātusamavāyād bīje nirudhyamāne aṅkurasyābhinirvṛttirbhavati ityuktam |
T05nagsaliu:734: 'atha punaḥ' iti tu abhāvādudbhava-sva-para-dvaya-īśvarādi-rahita-bīja-pṛthivyādi-sāmagryā eva aṅkurādi utpadyata iti uktam |
T05nagsaliu:739: śāśvatato na cocchedān na saṅkrānteḥ parīttataḥ |
T05nagsaliu:742: 'śāśvatato na' iti yasmādanyadbījam, anyo 'ṅkuraḥ, na ca ya
T05nagsaliu:745: na ca niruddhād, tathāpi bījanirodhe aṅkura utpadyate |
T05nagsaliu:746: tasmān na śāśvatato, na cocchedāditi na ca pūrvaniruddhādbījādaṅkuro niṣpadyate nācāpyaniruddhād
T05nagsaliu:747: api tu bījād niruddhāt tasminneva samaye
T05nagsaliu:750: na saṃkrāntitaḥ iti tu bījāṅkurau tu asadṛśau eva |
T05nagsaliu:755: sadṛśānuprabodhād iti tu yādṛśaṃ bījamupyate tādṛśameva phalābhinirvṛtiriti |
T05nagsaliu:764: upte śālyādi bīje hi śyāmākādiphalaṃ na hi |
T05nagsaliu:773: dvidhā hetuścapratyaya iti tu ādhyātmikaḥ pratītyasamutpādo hetūpanibandhanaḥ pratyayopanibandhanaśca dvayākāro 'vagantavyaḥ |
T05nagsaliu:774: iṣṭa iti abhīṣṭasya ca abhipretasya abhimatasya cetyadhivacanam |
T05nagsaliu:778: tatrādāvavidyādeśanād ādau avidyā, ante maraṇāṅgadeśanatvān mṛtyurante |
T05nagsaliu:779: yattayormadhye syāt tat tu madhya iṣyate |
T05nagsaliu:783: vedanā, vedanāpratyayā tṛṣṇā, tṛṣṇāpratyaya mupādānam, upādānapratyayo
T05nagsaliu:786: evamasya kevalasya mahato duḥkhaskandhasya samudayo bhavati |
T05nagsaliu:797: nāmarūpam, ṣaḍāyatanam, sparśo, vedanā, jātiḥ, jarāmaraṇañceti |
T05nagsaliu:801: evam ayaṃ pratītyasamutpādo dvādaśāṅgaḥ trisvabhāvatayā veditavyaḥ |
T05nagsaliu:805: avidyā yadi nādau syādante mṛtyurna saṃbhaved |
T05nagsaliu:806: 'avidyā yadi nādau syād' iti tu yadi avidyā cennābhaviṣyan naiva saṃskārāḥ prajñāsyante |
T05nagsaliu:807: tadvad jarāmaraṇaparyantaṃ cennābhaviṣyan naiva śokādi prajñāsyate |
T05nagsaliu:808: tebhyo bhinno na kutrāpi hyātmātmīyaśca vidyate |
T05nagsaliu:809: tatrāvidyāyā naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ saṃskārādi abhinirvartayāmītyato jarāmaraṇaparyantaṃ naivaṃ bhavati ahaṃ śokādi abhinirvartayāmīti |
T05nagsaliu:811: evam yāvajjarāmaraṇasyāpi naivaṃ bhavati vayaṃ jātyādibhirabhinirvartitā iti |
T05nagsaliu:820: asyeti tu ādhyātmikasya| pratyayastu sāmagrī ṣaṭ prakārakā iti ṣaḍvidhāḥ |
T05nagsaliu:824: tasmāt sūtre -ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ samavāyāt pṛthivyaptejovāyvākāśa-vijñānādistvādhyātmikasya pratītyasamutpādasya pratyayopanibandho draṣṭavyaḥ |
T05nagsaliu:829: anyacca asmin kāye yatkiñcidasti tatsarvaṃ saṃgṛhya pṛthivīdhāturucyate |
T05nagsaliu:830: anugraha tu saṃgrahaḥ, sambandho-mṛduḥ, āliṅganaṃ, piṇḍīkaraṇaṃ snigdhatā ca |
T05nagsaliu:835: anyacca yatkiñcitkaṃ tādṛśaṃ tatsarvaṃ tu tejodhāturucyate |
T05nagsaliu:838: āśvāso, bhāṣaṇaṃ, pralāpo, gamanāgamanaṃ kṣayo vṛddhiriti |
T05nagsaliu:840: vistāraḥ, saṅkocaḥ, kampanaṃ, calanaṃ, utkṣepaḥ, poṣaṇaṃ, vṛddhiḥ,
T05nagsaliu:841: pīnasaḥ, kāsaḥ, chikkā, ūrdhvavāyuradhovāyuranyaccāpi etatkāyamadhye yatkiñcit tādṛśamasti tatsarvam ekataḥ piṇḍīkṛtya vāyudhāturityucyate |
T05nagsaliu:849: pañcavijñānasaṃyutaḥ iti tāni pañcavijñānakāyāni, tataḥ kliṣṭaṃ manaścāpi
T05nagsaliu:850: iti kleśamayaṃ manaḥ, tāni ca caturmahābhūtāni ekataḥ piṇḍīkṛtya naḍakalāpayogena nāmarūpamityucyate
T05nagsaliu:853: rūpaṃ nāma pitroḥ śukraśoṇitodbhūtaṃ antarābhavamāśritya yat prathamaṃ nāmarūpābhinirvartanaṃ
T05nagsaliu:857: ātmotkarṣaścetyetatkleśasaṃyutaṃ kliṣṭaṃ mana iti ekataḥ piṇḍīkṛtaṃ nāmarūpamityucyate |
T05nagsaliu:864: asya kartrādi na vartate iti bhāvaḥ |
T05nagsaliu:866: iti tu asmābhirete utpāditā iti ca tairvayamutpāditā iti te 'nyonya
T05nagsaliu:868: teṣu satsu samutpādaḥ teṣvasatsu na saṃbhavaḥ |
T05nagsaliu:882: 'na strī', na pumān - na napuṃsakastu ādhyātmikastrī puruṣa-napuṃsakātmakaḥ |
T05nagsaliu:883: na cāhaṃ mam iti tu ātmātmīya-manyanā-viyuktatvāt |
T05nagsaliu:885: tadvat jalam, agnirvāyurākāśo vijñānadhātuścāpi nātmā, na sattvo, na jīvo,
T05nagsaliu:886: na jantuḥ, na manujo, na mānavo, na strī, na pumān, na napuṃsakam na cāhaṃ na mama syāt |
T05nagsaliu:887: na ceśvarādi anyat kiñcid iti jñātavyam |
T05nagsaliu:897: sādhāraṇāsādhāraṇa-svabhāvena ekapiṇḍatvena kalpayan saṃjñayā grahaṇatvād avidyeti ucyate
T05nagsaliu:909: sthitvā svakarmavaśena vijñaptyavabhāsa-vikalpodbhavānāṃ yadajñānaṃ seyamavidyā ityucyate
T05nagsaliu:930: dakṣiṇasyāṃ jambūdvīpaḥ, paścimāyāṃ aparagodānīyaḥ, uttarasyāṃ, ca kururiti |
T05nagsaliu:956: narā dvādaśa, ṣaḍ devāḥ ṣoḍaśa narakāstathā |
T05nagsaliu:962: tasmāt sūtre- yeṣāmeva ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāmeka-saṃjñā, piṇḍasaṃjñā, nityasaṃjñā, dhruvasaṃjñā,
T05nagsaliu:969: paramāṇūnāṃ parasparaṃ saṃcayātmakatvāt piṇḍagrāho na yujyate |
T05nagsaliu:982: evaṃ ṣaṇṇāṃ dhātūnāṃ tadanityādisvabhāvasya yadajñānaṃ iyamavidyetyucyate |
T05nagsaliu:983: tatra avidyeti tu vidyā na bhūtatvād avidyā |
T05nagsaliu:984: na tu vidyābhāvaḥ, abhāvastu na kiñcidapi |
T05nagsaliu:986: tasmād abhāvo niṣedho 'pi nāsti, paratvamapi nāsti |
T05nagsaliu:988: avidyā tu na vidyābhāvaḥ vidyādharmato viruddhā avidyeti ucyate |
T05nagsaliu:990: tadudbhavaḥ sattva bhājanaloka-svabhāvaḥ sādhāraṇaḥ, asādhāraṇaśca viśeṣavikalpavaśasambhavaḥ āśrayāstu caturdhyānānāṃ trividhabhāvanānvitatvād brahmakāyikādayo
T05nagsaliu:1003: imā yā ajñānam, adarśanam, anabhisamitā imā apyavidyetyucyante |
T05nagsaliu:1021: amārge mārgasaṃjñatvād, aśuciṣu śucisaṃjñatvād, amuktau mukti saṃjñatvācca mohajamapi abhisaṃskaroti
T05nagsaliu:1025: akuśala-kāyakarmata ātmano jñānasya ca paritrāṇārtha prāṇātipātaḥ adattādānaṃ, kāmamithyācāraḥ, unmādahetukaṃ madyapānam anyathā-nīpsita-vipākābhinirvartanamapi abhisaṃskaroti |
T05nagsaliu:1034: tatra avidyayā iti avidyā-pratyayena saṃskārabhāvābhisaṃskāritvād vibhāvitaṃ saṃskārabhāva-prativijñaptisvabhāvaṃ vijñānamabhinirvartate |
T05nagsaliu:1037: tataḥ iti tu saṃskāramāśritya bhāvānāṃ vijñaptiriti tu vijñāpakatvād vijñaptiḥ |
T05nagsaliu:1040: iti vijñānena sahodgatā iti tu vijñānasya hetuta udbhūtāḥ |
T05nagsaliu:1051: iti yatpūrvaṃ indriye satṛṣṇavāsanānāmarūpaṃ sthāpitaṃ tannāmarūpaṃ saṃniśritya cakṣurādi-ṣaḍindriyābhinirvartanena indriyasya ṣaḍāyatanāni prādurbhavantīti |
T05nagsaliu:1057: indriyavijñānaṃ rūpādiviṣayeṣu sparśa iva nirāntarameva pravartate |
T05nagsaliu:1059: asaṃcita-pañcavijñānāni saṃcita viṣayendriyaiḥ saha yugapadekatra bhūtatvāt sparśavanti santi, na tu sparśa ityucyate |
T05nagsaliu:1060: tasmādeva bhagavatāpi trayāṇāṃ dharmāṇāṃ saṃnipātaḥ sparśa ityuktam |
T05nagsaliu:1062: tadvat sparśarasāsvādaniyantraṇe ṣaṭsparśā kāyānāśritya ṣaḍvedanākāyā utpadyante |
T05nagsaliu:1065: vedanā tu sparśeṇa janitā sparśahetūdbhavā ityadhivacanam |
T05nagsaliu:1069: vedanāvabhāsākāravijñapti vikalpanāvaśodbhūtānāṃ trivargabhedena ṣaḍvedanākāyotpādād bhagavatā sparśasahabhavā vedanetyuktam |
T05nagsaliu:1070: tadvat kiñcidvedanāsvādasaktā abhiniveśātmikā hi vedanāhetukī tṛṣṇeti tṛṣṇodbhavaḥ |
T05nagsaliu:1075: sā ca indriyaviṣayavijñānabhedena tṛṣṇākāyaḥ ṣaḍdhā vyavasthāpitā |
T05nagsaliu:1098: athavā anityatayaiva dhvaṃsatvāt, utpādānantarameva anityatārākṣasena bhakṣaṇaṃ, pratihananaṃ,
T05nagsaliu:1100: evamabhinirvṛttau utpādahetunā jātipratyayena jaraiva abhinirvartate, tasmādeva jāterevaṃ jarāpi ca ityuktam |
